channel.title: Open Source on Laughman's Voloblog about CloudNative/AR/VR/CV

item.title: Cloud Native Sandbox
item.description: Github: https://github.com/rootsongjc/cloud-native-sandbox Cloud Native Sandbox can help you setup a standalone Kubernetes and istio environment with Docker on you own laptop.
